thisara samarasinha me tharjanaya kara aththe pasugiya wasare ohu melbarn nuwarata pamini dinaka, puwathpath sammukha sakachchawakata yayi paniwidayak yawa jagath je edirisinhawa konsal karyalayata genwa gena, inpasu ehi kamarayaka thanikara genayi.

amdanta eka paratama tharu wisi una, bas eke minissuth eka eka ewa kiyanna patana gaththa me sinduwa ahila, amda aapahu issarahata duwala gihin baluwa mokada sin eka kiyala, balinnam amdan ara alawapu thana thamayi me widiyata wela thiyenne ayin karapu kalle manamperi sinduwe anthima tikayi santha anthoni munithuma sinduwe mulatikayi kapila gihin me widiyata thamayi patiya joyint wela thiyenne.

sumathipala namwu hataek wiyathi me pudgalaya anuradhapura nagaraye madin jayashri maha bodhiya wetha yamin sitiyadi patakayan wenuwen ohu samaga katha karannata hakiwuye hithawath welenda wyaparikayaku magini.
